skills_sentences: Agile development methodologies including Scrum and Jira
Amazon Web Services including Lambda, IAM, CloudWatch, RDS, and S3
Code quality assurance and design pattern implementation
Containerization and orchestration with Docker and Kubernetes
Continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines
MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Oracle relational database management
Technical documentation including UML diagrams and API docs
Unit and integration testing with JUnit and Mockito
Version control using GitHub and Bitbucket
responsibility_sentences: Address security vulnerabilities and improve application performance through profiling and tuning
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including UI/UX designers, business analysts, and DevOps engineers
Conduct unit, integration, and performance testing using JUnit and Mockito
Create and maintain technical documentation and mentor junior developers
Design and develop scalable, high-performance Java-based applications aligned with business requirements
Engage with stakeholders through status updates, demos, and feedback incorporation
Implement backend solutions using Spring Boot microservices, Hibernate, and JPA
Manage bug fixes, log maintenance, and ensure robust exception handling
Optimize database queries and ensure data integrity with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Oracle
Write clean, maintainable code following coding standards and design patterns
